mapper.delete: delete from favorite where userid=#{userId} and dongcode=#{dongCode}
mapper.select: select hi.aptcode, hi.dong, hi.roadname, hi.jibun, hi.apartmentname, hd.floor, hd.dealamount from houseinfo hi natural join housedeal hd natural join favorite f where f.userid=#{userId} and hd.dealyear=year(now())
